#—É–¥–∞–ª–µ–Ω–∫–∞ #middle #400k
Company: Gotbit
Salary: –æ—Ç 1 000 –¥–æ 4 000$
Currently we are in search of a Middle+ Golang Developer to join our team.‚Äç
Your responsibilities will include:
‚Äî Developing backend services in Golang
‚Äî Creating APIs and microservices for client applications
‚Äî Integrating blockchain functionality into applications
‚Äî Contributing to the design of internal application architecture
‚Äî Writing and executing unit tests
‚Äî Reviewing code
Great if you have:
‚Äî Proficiency in commercial development (3+ years) of high-load WEB services using Golang
‚Äî Understanding of design patterns and practices, and their specific applications in Golang
‚Äî Familiarity with HTTP, gRPC protocols
‚Äî Hands-on experience with blockchain technologies is a great advantage
‚Äî Strong understanding of relational databases (mainly PostgreSQL and MySQL)
‚Äî Familiarity with containerization tools and automated deployment (Docker, K8S, Gitlab CI/CD)
‚Äî Proficiency in message brokers (Kafka/RabbitMQ)
‚Äî Experience with Frontend technologies (Javascript or Typescript) is an advantage
‚Äî Spoken English and Russian (B2+ and above).
What we offer:
‚Äî 20 paid vacation days and 5 sick days annually
‚Äî Full compensation for documented sick leave
‚Äî Wellness support: we cover expenses for sports, healthcare, coworking spaces, and team-building events
‚Äî Continuous learning: free corporate English courses led by a qualified teacher and monthly Gotbit Educational Meetups featuring industry leaders
‚Äî Global exposure: attend industry conferences with our sponsorship and connect with the world
‚Äî Collaborative environment: join our friendly and young team where all of your ideas will be heard
Contact: https://t.me/whazzupmary
